  • Deprecated Interfaces
    Interface
    Description
    io.atlasmap.api.AtlasConverter
    Use AtlasConverter
    io.atlasmap.api.AtlasFieldAction
    Use AtlasFieldAction
    io.atlasmap.spi.AtlasCombineStrategy
    COMBINE/SEPARATE mode has been deprecated. Use transformations with multiple field selection.
    io.atlasmap.spi.AtlasSeparateStrategy
    COMBINE/SEPARATE mode has been deprecated. Use transformations with multiple field selection.
  • Deprecated Classes
    Class
    Description
    com.sun.xml.xsom.impl.parser.SAXParserFactoryAdaptor
     
    io.atlasmap.v2.ActionListUpgradeDeserializer
    This was introduced for backward compatibility. Remove this in v2.0. https://github.com/atlasmap/atlasmap/pull/877
    io.atlasmap.v2.Collection
    io.atlasmap.v2.Expression
    Expression field action is deprecated. Mapping level expression has to be used instead.
  • Deprecated Enum Classes
    Enum Class
    Description
    io.atlasmap.json.v2.InspectionType
    Migrate to io.atlasmap.v2.InspectionType
    io.atlasmap.v2.MappingType
    io.atlasmap.xml.v2.InspectionType
    Migrate to io.atlasmap.v2.InspectionType
  • Deprecated Annotation Interfaces
    Annotation Interface
    Description
    io.atlasmap.spi.AtlasFieldActionInfo
    Use AtlasActionProcessor instead
  • Deprecated Fields

    Description
    io.atlasmap.v2.Validation.id
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    com.sun.xml.xsom.impl.ElementDecl.listSubstitutables()
     
    com.sun.xml.xsom.impl.scd.SimpleCharStream.getColumn()
     
    com.sun.xml.xsom.impl.scd.SimpleCharStream.getLine()
     
    com.sun.xml.xsom.XSDeclaration.isAnonymous()
    use the isGlobal method, which always returns the opposite of this function. Or the isLocal method.
    com.sun.xml.xsom.XSElementDecl.listSubstitutables()
    this method allocates a new array every time, so it could be inefficient when working with a large schema. Use XSElementDecl.getSubstitutables() instead.
    com.sun.xml.xsom.XSSchema.getSourceDocument()
    Since this method always returns null, if you are calling this method from XSSchema and not from XSComponent, there's something wrong with your code.
    io.atlasmap.api.AtlasContext.processPreview(Mapping)
    Use AtlasPreviewContext#processPreview(Mapping)
    io.atlasmap.api.AtlasContextFactory.getCombineStrategy()
    io.atlasmap.api.AtlasContextFactory.getSeparateStrategy()
    io.atlasmap.api.AtlasSession.getProperties()
    io.atlasmap.core.DefaultAtlasContext.processPreview(Mapping)
    Use AtlasPreviewContext#processPreview(Mapping)
    io.atlasmap.core.DefaultAtlasFieldActionService.getActionDetailByActionName(String)
    io.atlasmap.core.DefaultAtlasSession.getProperties()
    io.atlasmap.core.validate.BaseModuleValidationService.validateCombineMapping(Mapping, List<Validation>)
    io.atlasmap.core.validate.BaseModuleValidationService.validateSeparateMapping(Mapping, List<Validation>)
    io.atlasmap.service.AtlasService.createMappingRequestOld(InputStream, MappingFileType, UriInfo)
    io.atlasmap.service.AtlasService.getMappingRequestOld(MappingFileType)
    io.atlasmap.service.AtlasService.listMappingsOld(UriInfo, String)
    io.atlasmap.service.AtlasService.removeMappingRequestOld()
    io.atlasmap.service.AtlasService.resetMappingByIdOld()
    io.atlasmap.service.AtlasService.updateMappingRequestOld(InputStream, UriInfo)
    io.atlasmap.service.AtlasService.validateMappingRequestOld(InputStream, UriInfo)
    io.atlasmap.v2.Mapping.getDelimiter()
    io.atlasmap.v2.Mapping.getDelimiterString()
    io.atlasmap.v2.Mapping.getStrategy()
    io.atlasmap.v2.Mapping.getStrategyClassName()
    io.atlasmap.v2.Mapping.setDelimiter(String)
    io.atlasmap.v2.Mapping.setDelimiterString(String)
    io.atlasmap.v2.Mapping.setStrategy(String)
    io.atlasmap.v2.Mapping.setStrategyClassName(String)
    io.atlasmap.v2.Validation.getId()
    Use Validation.getDocId() instead
    io.atlasmap.v2.Validation.setId(String)
    Use Validation.setDocId(String) instead
  • Deprecated Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    com.sun.xml.xsom.parser.JAXPParser()
    Unsafe, use JAXPParser(factory) instead with security features initialized by setting XMLConstants.FEATURE_SECURE_PROCESSING feature.
    com.sun.xml.xsom.parser.XSOMParser()
    Unsafe, use XSOMParser(factory) instead with security features initialized by setting XMLConstants.FEATURE_SECURE_PROCESSING feature.
